item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/09/99-spec-tail-lights/#comment-301087">Tommy</a>.
I think I picked these up from Corksport originally. Probably a lot more cost effective to just try your luck and find a good condition used set, though.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tommy.

I think I picked these up from Corksport originally. Probably a lot more cost effective to just try your luck and find a good condition used set, though.
